 // relevant properties to get record
 var searchJsonObj = JSON.parse(vaVars.search_result_json_string);
 var resultNumber = searchJsonObj[vaVars.selected_faq].meta.number;
 gs.info('cw:resultNumber ' + resultNumber);

 var faqUtil = new global.VAFaqUtil();
 // build the header text
 header_text = faqUtil.buildHeaderText(resultNumber, vaVars.selected_type);
 
 header_text += '<br><br>';
gs.info('cw: vaVars.selected_faq:' + vaVars.selected_faq);
 var linkBuilder = new global.cxs_SearchResultLinkBuilder();
 var link = linkBuilder.build(searchJsonObj[vaVars.selected_faq], vaInputs.portal);
gs.info('cw: link.link' + link.link);
 //header_text += '<a href="'+link.link+'" target="_blank" >'+ 'Read full article'+ '</a>';
header_text += '<a href="'+"cep?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=" + resultNumber +'" target="_blank" >'+ 'Read full article'+ '</a>';
 // <p><a href="cep?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article={{vaInputs.show_knowledge_blocks.number}}" target="_blank">More Details</a></p>
 //header_text += '[Read full article]('+link.link+')'
 return header_text;
})()
